sql: SELECT p.category, ROUND(SUM(p.price * s.quantity), 2) as revenue, ROUND(SUM((p.price - p.cost) * s.quantity), 2) as profit, ROUND((SUM((p.price - p.cost) * s.quantity) / SUM(p.price * s.quantity)) * 100, 2) as profit_margin_pct FROM products p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.category ORDER BY profit DESC
